roleset.name: move over a wide area
roleset.note: ROAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'roam' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion. (from roam.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: jackals?
example.text: Jackals roam the streets at night, and gemsbok, hardy antelope with long straight horns, wander in from the desert to drink from water sprinklers.
